definitions.definition: to get knowledge or skill in a new subject or activity:
to make yourself remember a piece of writing by reading it or repeating it many times:
examples: I don't know how actors manage to learn all those lines.

definitions.definition: to start to understand that you must change the way you behave:
examples: She'll have to learn that she can't have everything she wants.

definitions.definition: to be told facts or information that you did not know:
examples: We were all shocked to learn of his death.
